questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years time we will be in 2026. I will be 28 or 29 years old. I will be an IT specialist in a big IT company or an IT freelancer. Like this I will be able to make a living of doing what I like with maybe my friends. I will have found the woman of my dreams. I will be the happiest man on Earth .
